```{r}
library(tidyr)
library (dplyr)
library (ggplot2)
library (lubridate)
```



```{r}

#Calculculate Mean Air temp 

setwd("C:\\Users\\Ed\\Documents\\Subclovergit")
getwd()
df_file <- read.table("LoggerTemp.txt",header=TRUE)
head(df_file)

df_file$date <- dmy(df_file$date)

df_file <- df_file%>%
group_by(date)%>%
summarise_each(funs(mean)) %>%
  mutate(TT = cumsum(Air))



write.table(df_file, "ThermalSum.txt")

```


Graph it 



```{r graph}

df_file %>% 
ggplot(aes(x=date, y= Air)) +
    geom_line()



```
